overview: After storming Edinburgh, he's back...  Winner of things. Triple J. ABCTV's Murray Foote.  I wrote this show in a cave using only the light from the screen of a Nokia 3600.  It took me 7 straight weeks and I only had one change of tracksuit pants.  I maintained sustenance by sucking condensation off the walls and toasting moths over my phone.  I need to recharge.  FAIL
title: Sam Simmons: Fail
